login.title: Login
login.hint: Enter your login and master key to access your data
login.createUser.message: User with this login not found. Do you want to create a new user?
login.error.shortKey: Master key must be at least 6 characters
login.error.invalid: Login or master key is incorrect
login.error.shortLogin: Login must contain at least 3 characters
login.error.userExists: User with this login already exists. Use "Login" button
login.error.init: Error during initialization. Check login and master key.
login.error.cloudKeyInvalid: Master key is incorrect for data in cloud. Please enter the correct master key.
login.error.localKeyInvalid: Master key is incorrect for local data. Please enter the correct master key.
syncConflict.title: Sync Conflict
syncConflict.hint: Different versions of data found in local storage and Google Drive.
syncConflict.resolved.cloud: Conflict resolved: used data from cloud
app.title: Password Manager
categories.title: Category Management
passwords.title: Password List
import.success.export: Data successfully exported to file. Save this file for synchronization between devices.
import.error.invalidFormat: Invalid file format. File must contain encrypted data.
import.prompt.masterKey: Enter master key for this login:
import.error.csv.empty: File is empty or contains only headers
import.error.csv.format: File may have invalid format. Continue import?
import.error.csv.failed: Failed to import data from file
import.csv.categories.limit: Note: some categories from import were not added, as limit reached ({limit} categories)
import.confirm.userExists: User "{login}" already exists. Data will be overwritten. Continue?
import.error.decryptFailed: Login or master key is incorrect. Failed to decrypt data.
google.error.shortKey: Master password must be at least 6 characters
google.error.protocol: Google OAuth requires HTTP/HTTPS. Use a server (python -m http.server 8000)
google.error.noConfig: Google API keys are not configured! See the README.md.
storage.error.save: Error saving data. Please try again.
reset.warning:
WARNING: All data will be permanently deleted!

This action will delete for current user:
- All saved passwords
- All categories
- Master key

Are you sure you want to continue?
reset.confirm: Last warning: All data will be lost forever. Continue?
reset.success: All data deleted. Now you can create a new account.
